discovery_rule.name: Rsyslog action discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of actions from the rsyslog impstats output

discovery_rule.name: Rsyslog dynafile discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of dynafiles from the rsyslog impstats output

item_prototype.name: {#ITEMNAME} Dynafile cache maxused
item_prototype.description: Amount of dynafile instances. There is an rsyslog parameter defining the max value possible.

discovery_rule.name: Rsyslog queue discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of queues from the rsyslog impstats output

trigger_prototype.name: Rsyslog queue "{#ITEMNAME}" full, discarding messages.
trigger_prototype.description: Rsyslog is trashing messages because there is no more space available.

trigger_prototype.name: Rsyslog queue "{#ITEMNAME}" too big: something is stuck!
trigger_prototype.description: If there is at least 100000 messages, that means that probably syslog is not being able to process them.
